title: Espresso Schaerer Coffee Art Plus SCA-1/Milk Cooler
item_description:
Espresso Schaerer Coffee Art Plus SCA-1/Milk Cooler

  • Manufacturer: Schaerer
  • Model: SCA-1
  • Serial Number: 1617325191
  • Voltage: 240 Volts
  • Width: 21”
  • Length: 16”
  • Height: 26” Overall

Automatic Coffee Espresso Machine. Always a Fresh Coffee Ground. It Powers Up but we don’t know how to make it work . Includes Milk Refrigerator on the Side. Measurements for Cooler 17×10×24”. See All Pictures For Temperature and More Details.
Dolly Not Included
